body: The Latin Americanist reports that a photo of football player Lionel Messi "appeared in a campaign ad for Argentine legislator Alfredo Olmedo, a candidate running for governor of Salta. 'Say yes to sport, say no to drugs' is the slogan of the ad [...] Messi’s lawyer, Ricardo Giusepponi, declared on Monday that Messi would sue Olmedo for improper use of his client’s image."
